README.html.title: ASE semester 1 2025 Portfolio | SaifASE
README.html.summary: ASE semester 1 2025 Portfolio Basic Object Orientated Software Engineering (BOOSE). Fill in the fields below. Syed Saif Ali Shah Group 4 Each element is covered in the weekly sessions, using the BOOSE library source code as an example. I will discuss how I implemented the more difficult elements (like the parser, implementing loops etc.) Keep your progress up to date below. Put "DONE" after each section, when you have done it. The number in brackets represents the component that each element contributes to. Checkpoint 1 Version Control (1) At least two documented commits to provided on GitHub Classroom BEFORE 12pm 7th October. At least 5 documented commits. Readme.md file filled in correctly. 2 Unit Tests for basic drawing commands above (1) Unit Test for moveto command (variables storing pen position are correct) Unit Test for drawTo command (variables storing pen position are correct) Unit Test for a multiline program. 3 XML Comments/documentation produced (1) Fully documented with XML comments and Documentation web site produced 4 Exception Handling (1) 5 Library (DLL) installed and working with reasonable user interface (2) Form interface with program window, output window and run button BOOSE DLL library installed call about method and display returned information in output/debug window you can use System.Diagnostics to output to the debug window 6 Basic drawing commands of the library are implemented (2) Moveto, circle, rect, pencolour, write. Unrestricted drawing programs can be run (1unrestrictedDrawing.boose) You MUST fill in the this form before submission and submit your zipped up project to myBeckett Read the hand in instructions on myBeckett carefully to ensure you are submitting everything correctly, as if you don't you may be subject to a penalty. Final Submission 1 Further Version Control (1) You must continue to use VC to a professional standard with frequent and clear commits Your Readme.md must be up to date 2 Use of Interfaces (1) Interfaces to be used for all classes where appropriate 3 Further Unit Testing (1) Tests for full program all of the facilities completed in 5,6 and 7 below It is up to you how design your tests (i.e. one test per facility or one test testing many but they must be clearly documented with XML comments) 4 Design Patterns (1) Use of factory Design Pattern for command creation Use of Singleton Design Pattern Demonstrate the use of another design pattern of your choice (for 5,6 and 7 you can click the links to see the example BOOSE programs that must be run, these are in your Portfolio. You must run the unrestricted programs and replace the image already there with an image of your BOOSE Interpreter running the BOOSE programs. You may show further programs in your portfolio.) 5 Replaced variables (2) * Int Real Array 6 Replaced if, while, for (2) * While For If else 7 Replaced Methods (2) * 8 Additional (web version, text-based version, extension to BOOSE itself, etc, discuss with your tutor) (2) * You must rewrite the functionality and not try and "hack the system". I've tried to make it so you can't but who knows, either way, you've been told. You MUST fill in this form whilst recording your YouTube Video AND submit it to myBeckett Read the hand in instructions on myBeckett carefully to ensure you are submitting everything correctly, as if you don't you may be subject to a penalty. Links These are for convinience. Check on myBeckett in the Assessment directory for any up to date links. BOOSE Documentation BOOSE DLL Download Assignment Specification - including all university details Detailed Assignment Information - with marking scheme Assignment Help Videos Remember that BOOSE.DLL maybe updated, as it may have bugs in it, or new features may be added. Keep updated on Discord and make sure you always have the latest version in your project. V1.0

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.ArrayDeclaratio.title: Class ArrayDeclarationCommand | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.ArrayDeclaratio.summary: Class ArrayDeclarationCommand Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Declares an array (int[] or real[]) in the VariableStore. public sealed class ArrayDeclarationCommand : ICommand Inheritance object ArrayDeclarationCommand Implements ICommand Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors ArrayDeclarationCommand(ExpressionEvaluator, string, string, string) Creates an array declaration command. public ArrayDeclarationCommand(ExpressionEvaluator eval, string type, string name, string sizeExpr) Parameters eval ExpressionEvaluator Expression evaluator used to calculate the size. type string Array type ("int" or "real"). name string Array name. sizeExpr string Expression for array size. Methods Execute() Creates the array in the VariableStore using the evaluated size. public void Execute()

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.AssignmentComma.title: Class AssignmentCommand | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.AssignmentComma.summary: Class AssignmentCommand Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Assigns a value to a variable (int/real/bool) depending on what is already declared. public sealed class AssignmentCommand : ICommand Inheritance object AssignmentCommand Implements ICommand Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AssignmentCommand(ExpressionEvaluator, string, string) Creates an assignment command for an already declared variable. public AssignmentCommand(ExpressionEvaluator eval, string name, string expr) Parameters eval ExpressionEvaluator Expression evaluator used to calculate the right hand side. name string Variable name. expr string Expression to assign. Methods Execute() Updates the variable in VariableStore real, int, or bool. public void Execute()

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.CallCommand.htm.title: Class CallCommand | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.CallCommand.htm.summary: Class CallCommand Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Calls a previously declared method and executes its body lines using the current interpreter. public sealed class CallCommand : ICommand Inheritance object CallCommand Implements ICommand Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors CallCommand(MiniFactory, string) Creates a call command. public CallCommand(MiniFactory factory, string args) Parameters factory MiniFactory Factory used for access to methods and evaluator. args string Raw arguments after 'call'. Methods Execute() Loads arguments into parameter variables, ensures the return variable exists, then runs each method body line through the current interpreter. public void Execute()

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.ExpressionEvalu.summary: Class ExpressionEvaluator Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Evaluates numeric and boolean expressions for the interpreter. Supports basic arithmetic, comparisons, and logical operators. public sealed class ExpressionEvaluator Inheritance object ExpressionEvaluator Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors ExpressionEvaluator(VariableStore) Creates an evaluator using the provided variable store. public ExpressionEvaluator(VariableStore store) Parameters store VariableStore Variable store for resolving variables. Methods EvalBool(string) Evaluates a boolean expression and returns a bool result. public bool EvalBool(string expr) Parameters expr string Expression string. Returns bool EvalNumber(string) Evaluates a numeric expression and returns a double result. public double EvalNumber(string expr) Parameters expr string Expression string. Returns double

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.MethodTable.htm.summary: Class MethodTable Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Stores method definitions and provides parsing for method headers. public sealed class MethodTable Inheritance object MethodTable Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods Add(MethodDefinition) Adds or replaces a method definition by name. public void Add(MethodDefinition def) Parameters def MethodDefinition Method definition. api/Booseapp.Interpreter.MiniFactory.htm.title: Class MiniFactory | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.MiniFactory.htm.summary: Class MiniFactory Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Factory that turns a single line of text into an ICommand. This is basically the interpreter's "command parser". public sealed class MiniFactory Inheritance object MiniFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors MiniFactory(AppCanvas) Creates the factory using a canvas. public MiniFactory(AppCanvas canvas) Parameters canvas AppCanvas Canvas used by drawing commands. Properties Evaluator Expression evaluator used by created commands. public ExpressionEvaluator Evaluator { get; } Property Value ExpressionEvaluator Methods Shared method table used for method storage and calls. public MethodTable Methods { get; } Property Value MethodTable Methods Create(string) Parses a line into a command instance. public ICommand Create(string line) Parameters line string Program line. Returns ICommand Concrete command to execute.

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.MiniInterpreter.title: Class MiniInterpreter | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.MiniInterpreter.summary: Class MiniInterpreter Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Simple interpreter that runs program text line-by-line. Also handles extracting and storing method definitions. public sealed class MiniInterpreter Inheritance object MiniInterpreter Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors MiniInterpreter(AppCanvas) Creates an interpreter from a canvas (creates the factory internally). public MiniInterpreter(AppCanvas canvas) Parameters canvas AppCanvas Canvas used for drawing commands. MiniInterpreter(MiniFactory) Creates an interpreter using an existing factory. public MiniInterpreter(MiniFactory factory) Parameters factory MiniFactory Factory used to create commands. Properties Current Holds the currently active interpreter instance (used by CallCommand). public static MiniInterpreter? Current { get; } Property Value MiniInterpreter Methods ExecuteSingleLine(string) Executes a single line (ignores blank lines and comments). public void ExecuteSingleLine(string line) Parameters line string Line to execute. Run(string) Runs a full program given as one string. public void Run(string programText) Parameters programText string Full program text. Run(string[]) Runs a program given as a string array. public void Run(string[] programLines) Parameters programLines string[] Program lines. RunProgram(string) Clears state, extracts method blocks, then executes remaining lines. public void RunProgram(string programText) Parameters programText string Full program text.

Methods Execute() Evaluates and applies the cursor movement. public void Execute()

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.PeekCommand.htm.summary: Class PeekCommand Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Reads a value from an array element into an already declared variable. public sealed class PeekCommand : ICommand Inheritance object PeekCommand Implements ICommand Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors PeekCommand(ExpressionEvaluator, string, string, string) Creates a peek command. public PeekCommand(ExpressionEvaluator eval, string targetVar, string arrayName, string indexExpr) Parameters eval ExpressionEvaluator Expression evaluator. targetVar string Variable to store the result in. arrayName string Array to read from. indexExpr string Index expression. Methods Execute() Writes to the array at the evaluated index. public void Execute()

Methods Execute() Declares the real in the VariableStore. public void Execute()

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.RectCommand.htm.summary: Class RectCommand Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Draws an unfilled rectangle at the current cursor position. public sealed class RectCommand : ICommand Inheritance object RectCommand Implements ICommand Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors RectCommand(ExpressionEvaluator, AppCanvas, string, string) Creates a rect command. public RectCommand(ExpressionEvaluator eval, AppCanvas canvas, string wExpr, string hExpr) Parameters eval ExpressionEvaluator Expression evaluator. canvas AppCanvas Canvas to draw on. wExpr string Width expression. hExpr string Height expression. api/Booseapp.Interpreter.VariableStore.h.title: Class VariableStore | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.VariableStore.h.summary: Class VariableStore Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Stores variables for the interpreter. Supports global and local scopes, plus int/real/bool and basic arrays. public sealed class VariableStore Inheritance object VariableStore Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Properties Instance Singleton instance used by the interpreter. public static VariableStore Instance { get; } Property Value VariableStore Methods Clear() Clears all variables and scope stacks. public void Clear() DeclareBool(string, bool) Declares a boolean variable in the current scope. public void DeclareBool(string name, bool value = false) Parameters name string value bool DeclareInt(string, int) Declares an int variable in the current scope. public void DeclareInt(string name, int value = 0) Parameters name string value int DeclareIntArray(string, int) Declares an int array (global). public void DeclareIntArray(string name, int size) Parameters name string size int DeclareReal(string, double) Declares a real (double) variable in the current scope. public void DeclareReal(string name, double value = 0) Parameters name string value double DeclareRealArray(string, int) Declares a real array (global). public void DeclareRealArray(string name, int size) Parameters name string size int EnterScope() Enters a local scope (used for methods). public void EnterScope() ExitScope() Exits the current local scope (if one exists). public void ExitScope() GetBool(string) Reads a boolean variable (local first, then global). public bool GetBool(string name) Parameters name string Returns bool GetInt(string) Reads an int variable (local first, then global). public int GetInt(string name) Parameters name string Returns int GetNumber(string) Convenience method that returns an int or real as a double. public double GetNumber(string name) Parameters name string Returns double GetReal(string) Reads a real variable (local first, then global). public double GetReal(string name) Parameters name string Returns double HasBool(string) Checks if a boolean variable exists (local first, then global). public bool HasBool(string name) Parameters name string Returns bool HasInt(string) Checks if an int variable exists (local first, then global). public bool HasInt(string name) Parameters name string Returns bool HasReal(string) Checks if a real variable exists (local first, then global). public bool HasReal(string name) Parameters name string Returns bool PeekIntArray(string, int) Reads a value from an int array element. public int PeekIntArray(string name, int index) Parameters name string index int Returns int PeekRealArray(string, int) Reads a value from a real array element. public double PeekRealArray(string name, int index) Parameters name string index int Returns double PokeIntArray(string, int, int) Writes a value into an int array element. public void PokeIntArray(string name, int index, int value) Parameters name string index int value int PokeRealArray(string, int, double) Writes a value into a real array element. public void PokeRealArray(string name, int index, double value) Parameters name string index int value double SetBool(string, bool) Updates an existing boolean variable (local first, then global). public void SetBool(string name, bool value) Parameters name string value bool SetInt(string, int) Updates an existing int variable (local first, then global). public void SetInt(string name, int value) Parameters name string value int SetReal(string, double) Updates an existing real variable (local first, then global). public void SetReal(string name, double value) Parameters name string value double

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.WriteCommand.ht.title: Class WriteCommand | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.WriteCommand.ht.summary: Class WriteCommand Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Assembly Booseapp.dll Writes text to the canvas. Supports strings, numeric expressions, boolean expressions, and simple concatenation using '+'. public sealed class WriteCommand : ICommand Inheritance object WriteCommand Implements ICommand Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors WriteCommand(ExpressionEvaluator, AppCanvas, string) Creates a write command. public WriteCommand(ExpressionEvaluator eval, AppCanvas canvas, string raw) Parameters eval ExpressionEvaluator Expression evaluator. canvas AppCanvas Canvas to write to. raw string Raw write argument. Methods Execute() Builds and writes the final text to the canvas. public void Execute()

api/Booseapp.Interpreter.html.title: Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.Interpreter.html.summary: Namespace Booseapp.Interpreter Classes ArrayDeclarationCommand Declares an array (int[] or real[]) in the VariableStore. AssignmentCommand Assigns a value to a variable (int/real/bool) depending on what is already declared. BooleanAssignmentCommand Assigns a boolean expression into an existing boolean variable. BooleanDeclarationCommand Declares a boolean variable (optionally with an expression). CallCommand Calls a previously declared method and executes its body lines using the current interpreter. CircleCommand Draws an unfilled circle at the current cursor position. ExpressionEvaluator Evaluates numeric and boolean expressions for the interpreter. Supports basic arithmetic, comparisons, and logical operators. IntDeclarationCommand Declares an integer variable. IntExpr Small integer-only expression evaluator used for simple int maths. Supports + - * /, brackets, unary +/- and int variables. MethodDefinition Represents a parsed method definition (name, return type, parameters and body lines). MethodTable Stores method definitions and provides parsing for method headers. MiniFactory Factory that turns a single line of text into an ICommand. This is basically the interpreter's "command parser". MiniInterpreter Simple interpreter that runs program text line-by-line. Also handles extracting and storing method definitions. MoveToCommand Moves the cursor to a new X,Y position on the canvas. PeekCommand Reads a value from an array element into an already declared variable. PenCommand Sets the drawing colour using r,g,b values (clamped to 0..255). PokeCommand Writes a value into an array element (tries int[] first, then real[]). RealDeclarationCommand Declares a real (double) variable (optionally with an expression). RectCommand Draws an unfilled rectangle at the current cursor position. VariableStore Stores variables for the interpreter. Supports global and local scopes, plus int/real/bool and basic arrays. WriteCommand Writes text to the canvas. Supports strings, numeric expressions, boolean expressions, and simple concatenation using '+'. Interfaces ICommand Base interface for all interpreter commands. Each command represents one executable line.

api/Booseapp.html.title: Namespace Booseapp | SaifASE
api/Booseapp.html.summary: Namespace Booseapp Classes AppCanvas Concrete canvas backed by a Bitmap/Graphics. Provides drawing + cursor position (Xpos/Ypos). Form1
